div.div: ἐγχρίμπτω, ἐνιχρίμπτω , aor. part. ἐγχρίμψᾱς, mid. ipf. ἐγχρίμπτοντο, pass. aor. imp. ἐγχριμφθήτω, part. ἐγχριμφθείς, ἐνιχριμφθέντα: press close to, draw near; of running close to the turningpost in a race, Il. 23.334, 338; grazing the boar by a lance - point, Il. 5.662; crowding close in combat, Il. 17.413; approaching very near, Il. 13.146.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
